channel.title: [RS2] Pmh1000's Spammer
channel.description:
Hey guys i saw a simple spammer made by frost and modded by ron and i was looking at it and decided to do some massive modifying to it. and in doing so i thought i should call it my own bc i added a lot. However i am still giving crdit for the original design [size=10pt][font=Verdana]Thank You Frostbyte100 [/font][/size] And For Editing It [size=10pt][font=Verdana]Thank You Ron [/font][/size].
I added some cool features and all to it and i hope you all like the work i did on it. Enjoy :P
[size=18pt]Version 0.8 Released[/size] Updates With Version 0.8 -Basically I Just Fixed A Few Scripting Bugs That Were Made By Ron :), thanks by the way :P
Currently 10 People Have Downloaded This Script + Downloads On Attachments

item.title: [RS2] Pmh1000's Spammer
item.dc:creator: @Pmh1000 Pmh1000
item.description:
@Pmh1000 wrote:

thanks for the changes. i just did a 300 number test and never got 7 with it so your right thanxs for catching that[br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 08:44:06 AM[/size][hr]and one note with your version this will not work with this:

Repeat
Spam;
If (TradeTyper=True) Then Check4Trade;
Begin
Wait((WaitTime*1000) + Random(123));
UntilDown;
End;
Until(Times = Dones)

it needs to be this or else it will only wait when it finds a trade which means fast yping with no break = bannage so ive taken the fixes youve put into my script so everyopne download the attachment from my frist post bc thats the most recent version

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Pmh1000's Spammer
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Wow nice scripting. Thanks for the credit, and dont bitch about rep Mr 1 rep.

I fixed a bug and I simplified your Ifs. It compiles faster. Thebug was, it didn’t get all the colors, becuase you random was set to 5 with a plus one. It should have been set to 6.

{//////////////////////////////////////////////////
//               RS Super Spammer Version 0.6    //
//                 By Frostbyte100               //
//             FIXED and Sexified by Ron         //
//               & Edited By Pmh1000             //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////
//  - Safer than shortkeys or any other programs //
//     since it types humanlike and uses the RS  //
//     text effects                              //
//  - Just fill in what you want it to say, then //
//     watch it spam that with a random text     //
//     effect every time, it has all possible    //
//     text combinations. Also put in which      //
//     sentence to spam, and how may times.      //
//  - Press F9 To Stop The Script                //
//  - Will Now Wait 3-4 Seconds Before Starting  //
//     To Type, Give You A Little Time :P        //
//  - Setup sentences on line 64-73 & Consts On  //
//     Lines 51-56. Enjoy!                       //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Verison Log                                   //
//  - 0.1::Release                               //
//  - 0.2::Added multi sayings.                  //
//  - 0.3 Released to public.                    //
//  - 0.4 My cool friend Ron fixed it.           //
//        Humanlike key strokes.                 //
//        Progress Report.                       //
//        Fixed sending [0] arrays.              //
//        Presses enter after each sentence      //
//        And cleaned code.                      //
//  - 0.5 Pmh1000 Took The Liberty To Edit It    //
//        And In Doing So Added A Random Phase   //
//        Option That Allows You To Do Random    //
//        Phases Which Does More Then Just One;  //
//        He Also Added A WaitTime Const That    //
//        Allows One To Choose The Ammount Of    //
//        Time Between Each Phrase Typed And     //
//        He Also Made A Better Report For It    //
//        As Well As A Function That Will Stop   //
//        Typing And End The Scipt If It Finds   //
//        That SomeOne Is Trading With You       //
//        (Works Great When Buying Something)    //
//        If You Turn It On                      //
//  - 0.6 Pmh1000 Just Did Some More Editing     //
//        And In Doing So Added A Way To Make    //
//        Mistakes When Typing And The Ability   //
//        To Do No Effect Or No Color Randomly   //
//        As Well As The Ability To Stop It By   //
//        Pressing F9 Which Will Let You Finish  //
//        Your Sentence                          //
//  - 0.7 Sexified by Ron                        //
//          Fixed a bug where it missed a color! //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////}

Program SuperSpammer;

{.include RSCI.txt}

Const
     Mistakes     = True; // If True Then Script May Make A Few Typing Errors *Recommended For Better AntiBan Protection* False To Have It Type Everything PERFECTLY EVERYTIME
     TradeTyper   = True; // Turn To False If Your Not Buying/Selling Anything; If True, The Script Will Terminate When It Finds That Someone Has Proposed A Trade *I Would Recommend Having Public Chat To Hide, But It Doesnt Matter*
     RandomPhrase = 1;    // Number Of Phases To Use, Goes Strait Down, For Example 3 Would Use One Of The First Three Randomly *Set To 1 If You Only Want To Use 1 Sentence*
     WaitTime     = 4;    // Number Of Seconds To Wait Between Spams
     UsePhrase    = 1;    // Which phrase you want to spam(1-10); *Set To 1 If You Have More Then One Phrase And Your Using RandomPhrase Function*
     Times        = 15;   // Number of times to spam.

Var
   Dones, w : Integer;
   Effect, Color, Sentence : Array[0..12] of string;

Procedure LoadIt;
Begin
     Sentence[1]   := '';
     Sentence[2]   := '';
     Sentence[3]   := '';
     Sentence[4]   := '';
     Sentence[5]   := '';
     Sentence[6]   := '';
     Sentence[7]   := '';
     Sentence[8]   := '';
     Sentence[9]   := '';
     Sentence[10]  := '';

//\\\\\\\\ DONT EDIT BELOW THIS POINT ////////\\

     Effect[1]:='shake:';
     Effect[2]:='wave:';
     Effect[3]:='scroll:';
     Effect[4]:='slide:';
     Effect[5]:='wave2:';
     Effect[6]:='';
     
     Color[1]:='red:';
     Color[2]:='';
     Color[3]:='green:';
     Color[4]:='cyan:';
     Color[5]:='purple:';
     Color[6]:='white:';
     Color[7]:='flash1:';
     Color[8]:='flash2:';
     Color[9]:='flash3:';
     Color[10]:='glow1:';
     Color[11]:='glow2:';
     Color[12]:='glow3:';
End;

Procedure ChangeReport(Reason : String);
Begin
     w := 0
     Status(Reason);
     ClearReport;
     ChangeReportWidth(290);
     AddToReport('      Pmh1000''s Auto_Spammer');
     AddToReport('From Frostbyte100 & Edited By Ron');
     AddToReport('++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++');
     AddToReport('Status: '+ Reason)
     AddToReport('Currently On Sentence #: ' + IntToStr(dones) + ' Of ' + IntToStr(Times));
End;

Procedure UntilDown;
Begin
     If ((IsFKeyDown(9)) or (w=1)) Then
     Begin
          ChangeReport('Script Stopped');
          If (Not(w=1)) Then
          Begin
               Writeln('Script Was Terminated By Pressing The F9 Key');
               Writeln('Thank You For Using Pmh1000''s Auto_Spammer!');
          End;
          Terminatescript;
     End;
End;

Procedure Check4Trade;
begin
     If (FindColorTolerance(x,y,8388736,11,350,478,430,10)) Then
     Begin
          WriteLn('Found Trade, Terminating Script');
          w := 1;
     end;
end;

Procedure SendKeysHuman2(text:String);
Var
  a1, a2, a3 : Integer;
  char1, char2 : String;
  mistake : Boolean;
Begin
  a1 := 1;
  a3 := Random(4) + 1;
  Repeat
    a2 := Random(50);
    If(a2<>5)Or(mistake = true)Then
      Begin
        Wait(Random(50)+20);
        SendKeys(Copy(text, a1, 1));
      End
      Else
      Begin
        mistake := true;
        char1 := (Copy(text, a1, 1));
        char1 := Lowercase(char1);
        char2 := char1;
        a2:= random(2);
        If(a2= 0)Then
          Case char1 Of
            '`' : char2:= '`';
            '1' : char2:= '`';
            '2' : char2:= '1';
            '3' : char2:= '2';
            '4' : char2:= '3';
            '5' : char2:= '4';
            '6' : char2:= '5';
            '7' : char2:= '6';
            '8' : char2:= '7';
            '9' : char2:= '8';
            '0' : char2:= '9';
            '-' : char2:= '0';
            '=' : char2:= '-';
            '~' : char2:= '~';
            '!' : char2:= '~';
            '@' : char2:= '!';
            '#' : char2:= '@';
            '%body%#039; : char2:= '#';
            '%' : char2:= '%body%#039;;
            '^' : char2:= '%';
            '&' : char2:= '^';
            '*' : char2:= '&';
            '(' : char2:= '*';
            ')' : char2:= '(';
            '_' : char2:= ')';
            '+' : char2:= '_';
            'q' : char2:= 'q';
            'w' : char2:= 'q';
            'e' : char2:= 'w';
            'r' : char2:= 'e';
            't' : char2:= 'r';
            'y' : char2:= 't';
            'u' : char2:= 'y';
            'i' : char2:= 'u';
            'o' : char2:= 'i';
            'p' : char2:= 'o';
            '[' : char2:= 'p';
            '{' : char2:= 'P';
            ']' : char2:= '[';
            '}' : char2:= '{';
            '\' : char2:= ']';
            '|' : char2:= '}';
            'a' : char2:= 'a';
            's' : char2:= 'a';
            'd' : char2:= 's';
            'f' : char2:= 'd';
            'g' : char2:= 'f';
            'h' : char2:= 'g';
            'j' : char2:= 'h';
            'k' : char2:= 'j';
            'l' : char2:= 'k';
            ';' : char2:= 'l';
            ':' : char2:= 'L';
            Chr(39) : char2:= ';';
            '"' : char2:= ':';
            'z' : char2:= 'z';
            'x' : char2:= 'z';
            'c' : char2:= 'x';
            'v' : char2:= 'c';
            'b' : char2:= 'v';
            'n' : char2:= 'b';
            'm' : char2:= 'n';
            ',' : char2:= 'm';
            '<' : char2:= 'M';
            '.' : char2:= ',';
            '>' : char2:= '<';
          ' / ' : char2:= '.';
            '?' : char2:= '>';
          End;
        If(a2= 1)Then
          Case char1 Of
            '`' : char2:= '1';
            '1' : char2:= '2';
            '2' : char2:= '3';
            '3' : char2:= '4';
            '4' : char2:= '5';
            '5' : char2:= '6';
            '6' : char2:= '7';
            '7' : char2:= '8';
            '8' : char2:= '9';
            '9' : char2:= '0';
            '0' : char2:= '-';
            '-' : char2:= '=';
            '=' : char2:= '=';
            '~' : char2:= '!';
            '!' : char2:= '@';
            '@' : char2:= '#';
            '#' : char2:= '%body%#039;;
            '%body%#039; : char2:= '%';
            '%' : char2:= '^';
            '^' : char2:= '&';
            '&' : char2:= '*';
            '*' : char2:= '(';
            '(' : char2:= ')';
            ')' : char2:= '_';
            '_' : char2:= '+';
            '+' : char2:= '+';
            'q' : char2:= 'w';
            'w' : char2:= 'e';
            'e' : char2:= 'r';
            'r' : char2:= 't';
            't' : char2:= 'y';
            'y' : char2:= 'u';
            'u' : char2:= 'i';
            'i' : char2:= 'o';
            'o' : char2:= 'p';
            'p' : char2:= '[';
            '[' : char2:= ']';
            '{' : char2:= '}';
            ']' : char2:= '\';
            '}' : char2:= '|';
            '\' : char2:= '\';
            '|' : char2:= '|';
            'a' : char2:= 's';
            's' : char2:= 'd';
            'd' : char2:= 'f';
            'f' : char2:= 'g';
            'g' : char2:= 'h';
            'h' : char2:= 'j';
            'j' : char2:= 'k';
            'k' : char2:= 'l';
            'l' : char2:= ';';
            ';' : char2:= Chr(39);
            ':' : char2:= '"';
            Chr(39) : char2:= Chr(39);
            '"' : char2:= '"';
            'z' : char2:= 'x';
            'x' : char2:= 'c';
            'c' : char2:= 'v';
            'v' : char2:= 'b';
            'b' : char2:= 'n';
            'n' : char2:= 'm';
            'm' : char2:= ',';
            ',' : char2:= '.';
            '<' : char2:= '>';
            '.' : char2:= '/';
            '>' : char2:= '?';
            '/' : char2:= '/';
            '?' : char2:= '?';
          End;
          SendKeys(char2);
      End;
    a1:= a1 + 1;
  Until a1 > Length(text);
End;

Procedure SendKeysHuman(Text : String);
Var
   a1 : Integer;
Begin
     a1:= 1;
     Repeat
           Wait(Random(220) + 15);
           SendKeys(Copy(Text, a1, 1));
           a1:= a1 + 1;
     Until(a1 > length(Text));
End;

Procedure Spam;
Var
   z : Integer;
   b : String;
Begin
     b := Color[1+Random(12)] + Effect[1+Random(6)];
     ChangeReport('Spamming');
     z := Random(RandomPhrase);
     If (z=0) Then
     Begin
          z := 1+random((RandomPhrase-1));
     End;
     If ((RandomPhrase=1) And (Mistakes=false)) Then
     begin
          SendKeysHuman(b + Sentence[UsePhrase]);
     end;
     If ((Not(RandomPhrase=1)) And (Mistakes=false)) Then
     begin
          SendKeysHuman(b + Sentence[z])
     end;
     If ((RandomPhrase=1) And (Mistakes=true)) Then
     begin
          SendKeysHuman2(b + Sentence[UsePhrase]);
     end;
     If ((Not(RandomPhrase=1)) And (Mistakes=true)) Then
     begin
          SendKeysHuman2(b + Sentence[z])
     end;
     Wait(30+Random(25));
     Keydown(13);
     wait(random(30)+20)
     KeyUp(13)
     Dones := Dones + 1;
     UntilDown;
End;

Begin
     ClearDebug;
     WriteLn('Thank you for using my RS spammer!');
     LoadIt;
     Wait(3000+random(1000))
     Repeat
           Spam;
           If (TradeTyper=True) Then Check4Trade;
           Begin
                Wait((WaitTime*1000) + Random(123));
                UntilDown;
           End;
     Until(Times = Dones)
     ChangeReport('Finished Spamming');
End.

Any suggestions to my autotyper?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

~Ron

Read full topic
